city.title: City
city.description: City name to search for available vehicles (e.g. Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro)

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Rental end date in format YYYY-MM-DD or DD/MM/YYYY. Defaults to next day if blank.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Rental start date in format YYYY-MM-DD or DD/MM/YYYY. For tomorrow use next day date.

vehicleCategory.title: Vehicle Category
vehicleCategory.description: Category: SUV, Sedan, Luxury, Van or Electric
